text: Instructions to Pray for All People
Therefore, I urge first of all \add that\add* petitions, prayers, requests, \add and\add* thanksgiving be made on behalf of all people,
on behalf of kings and all those who are in authority, in order that we may live a tranquil and quiet life in all godliness and dignity.
This \add is\add* good and acceptable before God our Savior,
who wants all people to be saved and to come to a knowledge of the truth.
For \add there is\add* one God and one mediator between God and human beings, the man Christ Jesus,
who gave himself a ransom for all, the testimony at the proper time,
for which I was appointed a herald and an apostle—I am speaking the truth, \add I am\add* not lying—a teacher of the Gentiles in faith and truth.
Therefore I want the men in every place to pray, lifting up holy hands without anger and dispute.
Likewise also the women should adorn themselves in appropriate clothing, with modesty and self-control, not with braided hair and gold jewelry or pearls or expensive clothing,
but with good deeds which are fitting for women who profess godliness.
A woman must learn in quietness with all submission.
But I do not permit a woman to teach or to exercise authority over a man, but ⸤to remain quiet⸥\f + \fr 2:12 \ft Literally “to be in quietness” \f*.
For Adam was formed first, then Eve,

and Adam was not deceived, but the woman, \add because she\add*\ef + \fr 2:14 \ft ﻿*Here “\add because\add*” is supplied as a component of the participle (“was deceived”) which is understood as causal \ef* was deceived, came into transgression.
But she will be saved through the bearing of children, if she continues in faith and love and holiness with self-control.
